statements: SELECT * FROM leadership_roles;
SELECT leader_name, group_name, group_id FROM leadership_roles;
SELECT group_name, leader_name FROM leadership_roles WHERE group_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM leadership_roles WHERE leader_name = 'John';
SELECT group_id, leader_name FROM leadership_roles ORDER BY group_id DESC;
SELECT group_name, leader_name FROM leadership_roles WHERE group_id = 1;
SELECT leader_name, group_name FROM leadership_roles WHERE group_id = 2 ORDER BY leader_name DESC;
SELECT group_name FROM leadership_roles WHERE leader_name LIKE 'M%' ORDER BY group_name;
SELECT * FROM leadership_roles WHERE group_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND leader_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT leader_name FROM leadership_roles WHERE group_id > 3 ORDER BY leader_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM leadership_roles;
SELECT leader_id, group_name FROM leadership_roles;
SELECT group_name, leadership_title FROM leadership_roles WHERE leader_id = 1;
SELECT group_name, COUNT(leader_id) AS total_leaders FROM leadership_roles GROUP BY group_name;
SELECT * FROM group_members ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM leadership_roles WHERE group_name = 'Engineering' ORDER BY leader_id DESC;
SELECT leader_id, group_name FROM leadership_roles WHERE leadership_title = 'Manager' AND group_name = 'Finance' ORDER BY leader_id ASC;
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM group_members WHERE group_name = 'Marketing' ORDER BY member_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM group_members WHERE member_role = 'Developer' ORDER BY member_id ASC;
SELECT leader_id, group_name, leadership_title FROM leadership_roles WHERE leader_id > 100 AND leadership_title LIKE '%Lead%' ORDER BY group_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM LeadershipRoles WHERE leader_id = 1;
SELECT leader_name, leadership_position FROM LeadershipRoles WHERE group_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Groups WHERE group_type = 'Admin';
SELECT group_name, group_description FROM Groups WHERE group_id = 2;
SELECT leader_id, representation_type FROM Representation WHERE group_id = 2;
SELECT leader_name, leadership_position FROM LeadershipRoles WHERE group_id = 2;
SELECT group_name, group_type FROM Groups WHERE group_id = 5;
SELECT representation_type, leader_id, group_id FROM Representation WHERE representation_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT leader_name, leadership_position FROM LeadershipRoles WHERE leader_id = 4;
SELECT group_name, group_description FROM Groups WHERE group_type = 'Tech';
SELECT * FROM group_members WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT id, name FROM group_members WHERE group_name = 'Finance';
SELECT group_name, role FROM group_members WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM groups ORDER BY group_name ASC;
SELECT group_name, COUNT(*) AS member_count FROM group_members GROUP BY group_name;
SELECT name, group_name, role FROM group_members WHERE role='Admin' ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT group_name, COUNT(id) AS member_count FROM group_members GROUP BY group_name
SELECT group_name, group_description FROM groups WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(group_description) > 50
SELECT role_name FROM leadership_roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%Manager%'
SELECT group_name, DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_start_date FROM group_leaders WHERE end_date IS NULL
SELECT * FROM GroupLeadership WHERE leader_role = 'CEO';
SELECT group_name, leader_name FROM GroupLeadership WHERE leader_role = 'President' ORDER BY group_name ASC;
SELECT group_name, COUNT(leader_name) AS leader_count FROM GroupLeadership GROUP BY group_name HAVING leader_count > 1 ORDER BY leader_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM GroupMembers WHERE member_role = 'Manager' OR member_role = 'Supervisor';
SELECT group_name, member_name, member_role FROM GroupMembers WHERE group_name LIKE 'Marketing%' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM GroupLeadership
SELECT group_name, leader_name, leader_role FROM GroupLeadership ORDER BY leader_name DESC
SELECT group_name, COUNT(*) AS leader_count FROM GroupLeadership GROUP BY group_name
SELECT * FROM GroupMembers WHERE member_role = 'Leader'
SELECT group_name, leader_name, leader_role FROM GroupLeadership INNER JOIN GroupRepresentation ON GroupLeadership.id = GroupRepresentation.leader_id
